title: A disco classic!
review: Simply one of the finest movies ever made, from its iconic opening sequence to its magnificent soundtrack the film is just perfect.

title: Overrated
review: I was expecting big things from this but it turned out to be silly rather than exciting.

title: Overrated
review: Really don't know what all the fuss is about, nice cinematograthy but thats all. There is very little tension and no real action, not a bad film just not a very good one.
